Plot: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.
Title: Sleeping Beauty
Writer: Erdman Penner (story adaptation), Charles Perrault (story "Sleeping Beauty"), Joe Rinaldi (additional story), Winston Hibler (additional story), Bill Peet (additional story), Ted Sears (additional story), Ralph Wright (additional story), Milt Banta (additional story)
Actors: Mary Costa, Bill Shirley, Eleanor Audley, Verna Felton
tomatoConsensus: This Disney dreamscape contains moments of grandeur, with its lush colors, magical air, one of the most menacing villains in the Disney canon.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
